pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for Statistics Canada's Open Economic Data // An easy connection with R to Statistics Canada's Web Data Service. Open economic data (formerly known as CANSIM tables, now identified by Product IDs (PID)) are accessible as a data frame, directly in the user's R environment. Warin, Le Duc (2019) doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.10544735.
